document.full_text: u.s. safety investigators have launched a new review of steering complaints in dodge ram pickup trucks that could result in a bigger recall of that vehicle, documents showed on friday.
document.title: u.s. probes new steering complaints on dodge pickups
lines_and_colors: u.s. safety investigators have launched a new review of steering complaints in dodge ram pickup trucks that could result in a bigger recall of that vehicle, documents showed on friday.
